question: Which country celebrates the biennial cultural festival "Erau"?
explanation: Indonesia celebrates the biennial cultural festival "Erau". Erau is an Indonesian biennial cultural festival, taking place in East Kalimantan. Erau Festival, held every September, has now been included in the Indonesian national tourism calendar of events. It is no longer associated with the cultural tradition of the Kukar Sultanate palace, but rather to showcase the arts and culture that exist and thrive across the regency.
